text: The 1967–68 season was the 59th year of football played by Dundee United, and covers the period from 1 July 1967 to 30 June 1968. United finished in eleventh place in the First Division. ==Match results== Dundee United played a total of 42 competitive matches during the 1967–68 season. ===Legend=== {| class="wikitable" |- |- bgcolor = "#d0ffe3" |Win |- bgcolor = "#f3f3f3" |Draw |- bgcolor = "#ffd0e3" |Loss |} All results are written with Dundee United's score first.
